/usr/bin/c++    -O3 -Wall -fmessage-length=0 --std=c++11 -pthread -fPIC -std=c++0x -fexceptions -frtti -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections   CMakeFiles/sample_or_tutorial_4_gui.dir/cpp/main.cpp.o  -o sample_or_tutorial_4_gui  -L/usr/local/lib -rdynamic -lrealsense_projection -lrealsense_image -lrealsense_playback -lrealsense_record -lrealsense_log_utils -lrealsense -lpthread -lrealsense_object_recognition -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_core -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:
